text: 13.8 The policies set out in this chapter support the council’s strategic priorities to reduce future emissions arising from new development within the borough, by delivering low-energy developments that require minimum energy for space heating, providing ultra-efficient systems for heating and hot water, combined with high levels of insulation, that will minimise the costs to future occupants. 10 Tower Hamlets Air Quality Action Plan (AQAP) 2022-2027 BACK TO POLICIES 13.9 This section contains the following policies: z   CG1: Mitigating and adapting to a changing climate z   CG2: Low energy buildings z   CG3: Low carbon energy and heating z   CG4: Embodied carbon, circular economy and retrofit z   CG5: Overheating z   CG6: Managing flood risk z   CG7: Sustainable drainage z   CG8: Water efficient design z   CG9: Air quality z   CG10: Noise and vibration z   CG11: Contaminated land and storage of hazardous substances
